pullrequest.title: address issue #494 and issue #1143 for simbody

content.raw:
I moved some of the expectations around since parts of the test are aborted early, and found that GetAxisFrameOffset is failing when the child link is the world. (see b37819474512).
~~~
[Dbg] [494_joint_axis_frame.cc:82] SpawnJoint revolute world parent
[Dbg] [494_joint_axis_frame.cc:107] test case with joint axis specified in parent model frame.
[Dbg] [494_joint_axis_frame.cc:119]   where parent is another link (not world).
[Err] [Joint.cc:991] Joint has no child link.
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/test/regression/494_joint_axis_frame.cc:180: Failure
Value of: axisJointFrame2
  Actual: 0.999035 0.043924 0
Expected: axisJointFrame
Which is: 1 0 0
~~~
content.html:
I moved some of the expectations around since parts of the test are aborted early, and found that GetAxisFrameOffset is failing when the child link is the world. (see b37819474512).

[Dbg] [494_joint_axis_frame.cc:82] SpawnJoint revolute world parent
[Dbg] [494_joint_axis_frame.cc:107] test case with joint axis specified in parent model frame.
[Dbg] [494_joint_axis_frame.cc:119]   where parent is another link (not world).
[Err] [Joint.cc:991] Joint has no child link.
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/test/regression/494_joint_axis_frame.cc:180: Failure
Value of: axisJointFrame2
  Actual: 0.999035 0.043924 0
Expected: axisJointFrame
Which is: 1 0 0
